ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hornblower tries to catch a Leanhaun Sidhe in a bar but is interrupted by a pair of his fellow avatars, the Sun Twins. The three fight over their quarry and she escapes. Kevin Matchstick, arriving on the scene, berates them--they're supposed to fight evil, not each other. The Hornblower apologizes but the Sun Twins are unrepentant.
Kevin and Kirby Hero are attacked by hell-hounds coordinated by the Sprigginflints and the Pale Incanter. Then Kevin is forced into a fight with another avatar, the Dragonslayer. Kevin wins, but the Bat burns him for fighting a fellow hero. When they get back to their apartment, they find Isis, who has come to town to help, along with her two sisters.
